src: မိူဝ်းလဵဝ်ႁဝ်းမီးၼူဢၼ်လႆႈ 4 လိူၼ် ဢၼ်ဢမ်ႇမီးတၢင်းပဵၼ်ယဵဝ်ႈၸဵမ်း ဢၼ်ၵႆႉယၢမ်ႈပဵၼ်တၢင်းပဵၼ်ယဵဝ်ႈၸဵမ်း မၼ်းၸၢႆးၽိူမ်ႉလၢတ်ႈၼႄထႅင်ႈ။
mt: 4 months ago we had a baby who has not had any symptoms of cancer, and has not been diagnosed with cancer, and my son has been diagnosed with cancer.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur ဢၼ်ပဵၼ် ၶူးမေႃလူင်ပၢႆးယႃႈယႃ တီႈ ၸၼ်ႉၸွမ် Dalhousie  တီႈဝဵင်း Halifax ၼႂ်းၸိုင်ႈ Nova Scotia လႄႈ ႁူဝ်ပဝ်ႈ ၶွင်ၸုမ်းၽႄလွင်ႈယူတ်းယႃ လႄႈ ပၢႆးသၢႆႊ ၶွင် မုၵ်ႉၸုမ်းတၢင်းပဵၼ်ယဵဝ်ႈဝၢၼ်ၶွင်မိူင်းၶၼေႇတႃႇ ပၼ်ၽၢင်ႉဝႃႈ လွင်ႈၶူၼ်ႉၶႂႃႉၼၼ်ႉ ယင်းတိုၵ်ႉၸဝ်ႉၼႃႇပူၼ်ႉၼႆယဝ်ႉ။
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the Canadian Society of Tropical Medicine and Travelers, said the outbreak was "very concerning."
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: မိူၼ်ၽူႈလူင်ႉလႅၼ်ႇတၢင်ႇၵေႃႉၵမ်ႈၽွင်ႈသေ မၼ်းၸၢႆးမီးလွင်ႈၶွင်ႉၶမ်ၸႂ် ၼိူဝ်လွင်ႈဝႃႈ တၢင်းပဵၼ်ယဵဝ်ႈၸဵမ်းၼၼ်ႉ ၸၢင်ႈယူတ်းယႃလႆႈယူႇႁိုဝ် ဢၼ်လႆႈႁၼ်ယူႇၼၼ်ႉ ဢမ်ႇမီးသင်ၵပ်းၵၢႆႇၼိူဝ်ၵူၼ်းဢၼ်ပဵၼ်တၢင်းပဵၼ်ယဵဝ်ႈၸဵမ်း မၢႆ 1 ၼၼ်ႉ။
mt: The father of the boy, who was diagnosed with autism, said he was not aware of the boy's autism until he saw the boy's behavior.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: မိူဝ်ႈဝၼ်းၸၼ်ၼၼ်ႉ Sara Danius ၵေႃႉဢၼ်ပဵၼ်ၽူႈၼမ်းၼႂ်းတႃႇသေႇၶွင် ၸုမ်းပွင်ၵၢၼ် Nobel  တႃႇလိၵ်ႈလၢႆး တီႈ Swedish Academy ၼၼ်ႉ လႆႈပိုၼ်ၽၢဝ်ႇၸွမ်းဢွမ်လူမ်း Sveriges Radio တီႈမိူင်းသုၺ်ႇၻဵၼ်ႊ(Sweden) ႁႂ်ႈၵူၼ်းတင်းၼမ်လႆႈႁူႉ ဝႃႈ ၸုမ်းပွင်ၵၢၼ်ၶဝ်ဢမ်ႇၸၢင်ႈၵပ်းသိုပ်ႇၸူး Bob Dylan တႃႇလၢတ်ႈလွင်ႈဝႃႈ မၼ်းၸၢႆးလႆႈႁပ်ႉသူး Nobel Prize 2016 ၽၢႆႇလိၵ်ႈလၢႆးၼၼ်ႉၵမ်းသိုဝ်ႈလႆႈလႄႈ ၶဝ်ၸင်ႇယွမ်းၵၢၼ်ႉသေၵိုတ်းယင်ႉပႅတ်ႈတႃႇၵပ်းသိုပ်ႇႁႃမၼ်းၸၢႆးယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, which awards the Nobel Prize in Literature, told Swedish radio station Sveriges Radio that the academy had decided not to award the prize to Bob Dylan.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: ဢွၼ်တၢင်းတၢင်းၼႃႈၼႆႉတီႈပဵၼ်ႁူဝ်ၼႃႈၶွင် Ring ၸိူဝ်ႈ Jamie Siminoff မၢႆဝႆႉဝႃႈ ၵုမ်ႇပၼီမၼ်းပဵၼ်မႃးမိူဝ်ႈမၼ်းဢမ်ႇလႆႈယိၼ်းသဵင်မၢၵ်ႇၽၵ်းတူႁူင်းလူတ်ႉၼႆယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The ringtone was created by Jamie Siminoff, who said he was inspired by the sound of a ringing phone when he was unable to answer a call because he was stuck in traffic.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

mt: His son said he had set up a barricade to protect the plane.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff လၢတ်ႈဝႆႉဝႃႈ တေတၢင်ႇၶၢႆ ဝၢႆးသေလႆႈၼႄ ႁၢင်ႊၾၢင်မၼ်း ၼႂ်းတွၼ်ႊၸိူင်း Shark Tank ပီႊ2013 ယဝ်ႉၼၼ်ႉ တီႈၼၼ်ႉ ပၢင်ၼႄၼႆႉ လႆႈပၢၵ်ႈပႅတ်ႈ ၵၢၼ်ၵမ်ႉထႅမ်ငိုၼ်းလွင်ႈတႄႇတင်ႈမႃးၼႆယဝ်ႉ။
mt: Siminoff said the company would be featured on the show Shark Tank in 2013, where the pitch was shut down by the panel of investors.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: မိူဝ်ႈႁၢင်ပီ 2017 ၼၼ်ႉ Siminoff ပေႃႇဢွၵ်ႇမႃးၼႂ်းငဝ်းႁၢင်ႊသဵင်ၶွင်ႉ QVC ဢၼ်ပဵၼ်ၶွင်ႉထီႊဝီႊ ၽၢႆႇၶၢႆၶူဝ်း ၼၼ်ႉယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
mt: 2017, Siminoff launched the product on the QVC home shopping network, which sells products directly to consumers.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring ယင်းလႆႈငူပ်ႉငီႉၵၼ်တင်းၵုမ်ႊပၼီႊ ADT Corporation လွင်ႈဢၼ်ၶဝ်လႆႈတၢင်ႇၶိုၼ်ႈလုမ်းတြႃးၵဵဝ်ႇလူၺ်ႈၵၢၼ်ၶေႉၶဵင်ႇလွင်ႈႁူမ်ႇလူမ်ႈၶွင်ၶဝ်။
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: မီးယႃႁႄႉတၢင်းပဵၼ် (vaccine) ဢၼ်လႆႈၸၢမ်းႁဵတ်းၶိုၼ်ႈမႃး လႄႈၸၢင်ႈလူတ်းယွမ်းတူဝ်ၼပ်ႉၵူၼ်းတၢႆယွၼ်ႉတၢင်းပဵၼ် ဢီႊပူဝ်ႊလႃႊ (Ebola) ယူႇသေတႃႉ၊ ႁၢၼ်ႉတေႃႇယၢမ်းလဵဝ်ၼႆႉ ဢမ်ႇပႆႇမီးယႃဢၼ်လႂ် ဢၼ်ၵိုင်ႇငၢမ်ႇ တႃႇၸႂ်ႉယူတ်းယႃၵူၼ်းဢၼ်ၸပ်းတၢင်းပဵၼ်ဝႆႉယဝ်ႉၼၼ်ႉ။
mt: တီႈၼႂ်းပိုၼ်ႉတီႈၼၼ်ႉ မီးယႃႁႄႉတၢင်းပဵၼ် (vaccine) ဢၼ်လႆႈၸၢမ်းႁဵတ်းၶိုၼ်ႈမႃး လႄႈၸၢင်ႈလူတ်းယွမ်းတူဝ်ၼပ်ႉၵူၼ်းတၢႆယွၼ်ႉတၢင်းပဵၼ် ဢီႊပူဝ်ႊလႃႊ (Ebola) ယူႇသေတႃႉ၊ ႁၢၼ်ႉတေႃႇယၢမ်းလဵဝ်ၼႆႉ ဢမ်ႇပႆႇမီးယႃဢၼ်လႂ် ဢၼ်ၵိုင်ႇငၢမ်ႇ တႃႇၸႂ်ႉယူတ်းယႃၵူၼ်းဢၼ်ၸပ်းတ
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: ၶွင်ပတိၸီႇဝၶွၵ်ႉတေးလ် ဢၼ်ၼိူင်ႈ ZMapp ၼၼ်ႉ မိူဝ်ႈတႄႇမၼ်းၼႄၶေႃႈမၼ်ႈၵႅၼ်ႇတီႈၼႂ်းၵၢၼ်ၶူၼ်ႉၶႂႃႉ ၵူၺ်းၵႃႈ လွင်ႈႁဵၼ်းႁူႉဢၼ်ထုၵ်ႇမႅၼ်ပိူင်ၼၼ်ႉၸီႉၼႄဝႃႈ မၼ်းမီးလွင်ႈလီဢေႇသေ ဢၼ်ၶူၼ်ႉသွၵ်ႈႁႃ တႃႇပွင်ႈၵၼ်လွင်ႈတၢႆ။
mt: The experimental ZMapp treatment was first developed by scientists at the University of Texas Medical Branch in Galveston, but the lab was devastated by Hurricane Ike in 2008, and the research was taken up by Mapp Biopharmaceutical.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: ၵၢၼ်ၸၢမ်းတူၺ်း PALM ၼၼ်ႉ  လႆႈၸႂ်ႉ Zmapp တႃႇပဵၼ်ဢၼ်ၵုမ်းၵမ်၊ ပွင်ႇဝႃႈ ၸဝ်ႈပၢႆးသၢႆႊၶဝ် ၸႂ်ႉမၼ်းႁဵတ်းပဵၼ်ငဝ်ႈသေ ဢဝ်လၢႆးယူတ်းယႃတၢင်ႇၸိူဝ်းတႃႇသၢမ်လၢႆးမႃးတႅၵ်ႈၼိူင်းၵၼ်တင်းမၼ်းယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The PALM project has been using Zmapp to treat patients, saying the drug was developed by scientists and tested in monkeys.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: ၸုမ်းလဵၼ်ႈႁႅင်းတူဝ်ၶိင်းၸိုင်ႈမိူင်းဢမေႇရီႉၵၢၼ်ႇ(USA Gymnastics) ၵမ်ႉထႅမ် လိၵ်ႈၵေႃႇမတီႇဢူဝ်ႇလၢမ်ႇပိတ်ႉၸိုင်ႈမိူင်းဢမေႇရီႉၵၢၼ်ႇ(the United States Olympic Committee)သေ ႁပ်ႉဢဝ်လွင်ႈဢၼ် ၵူၼ်းလဵၼ်ႈႁႅင်းၶဝ် တိုၼ်းလူဝ်ႇလွင်ႈႁူမ်ႇလူမ်ႈလုမ်းလုမ်းယဝ်ႉ တႃႇၶိုၼ်ႈပၼ်သင်ႉ သိင်ႇဝႅတ်ႉလွမ်ႉႁူမ်ႇလူမ်ႈဢၼ်ၼိုင်ႈ ပုၼ်ႈတႃႇ ၽူႈလဵၼ်ႈႁႅင်းၵတ်ႉၶႅၼ်ႇႁဝ်းၶဝ်။
mt: USA Gymnastics has agreed to pay $425 million to settle a federal investigation into its handling of sexual abuse allegations against former team doctor Larry Nassar, who was convicted of molesting female athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: ႁဝ်းႁၼ်လီၸွမ်းၶေႃႈပိုၼ်ၽၢဝ်ႇ USOC ဢၼ်ပဵၼ်ၽွၼ်းလီ တႃႇၽူႈလဵၼ်ႈႁႅင်းႁဝ်း လႄႈ မုၵ်ႉၸုမ်းႁဝ်း၊ ယဝ်ႉၵေႃႈ တင်းတၢင်းလဵၼ်ႈၶဝ်။ ယူဝ်ၶႄးတေလႆႈမႃးၽွၼ်းလီၼမ် သင်ႁဝ်းသိုပ်ႇၵႂႃႇတၢင်းၼႃႈၸွမ်း တၢင်းလႅၵ်ႈလၢႆႈဢၼ်မီးတီႈပွင်ႇလီ ၼႂ်းမုၵ်ႉၸုမ်းႁဝ်း၊ ၽိူဝ်ႇတႃႉ ယႃႉပႅတ်ႈလွင်ႈၸိုဝ်ႈၸႂ်ႈမၼ်းၼၼ်ႉ။
mt: We are grateful to the USOC for its support of our athletes and teams, and we look forward to working with them. We are also grateful to our athletes and teams for their support of the USOC, and we look forward to working with them. We are also grateful to our athletes and teams for their support of the USOC, and we look forward to working with them.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: ၸုမ်းလဵၼ်ႈဢဵၼ်ႁႅင်းၽၢႆႇ Gymnastics ၶွင်မိူင်း USA  ၶဝ် ၵမ်ႉထႅမ်ႁၼ်လီၸွမ်းၵၢၼ်သွပ်ႇထတ်းတူၺ်းၶေႃႈမုၼ်းဢၼ်လွတ်ႈလႅဝ်း တွၼ်ႈတႃႇတေႁဵတ်းႁႂ်ႈမီးလွင်ႈၸႅင်ႈလႅင်းလီ ၵပ်းၵၢႆႇလူၺ်ႈလွင်ႈဝႃႈ ပဵၼ်ယွၼ်ႉသင်လႄႈလွင်ႈဢၼ်ၵူၼ်းၸိူဝ်းလႆႈၶၢမ်ႇ Larry Nassar ပူၼ်ႉပႅၼ်လူလၢႆ လၢတ်ႈဢွၵ်ႇမႃးႁတ်းႁတ်းႁၢၼ်ႁၢၼ်ၼၼ်ႉ လွတ်ႈႁူလွတ်ႈတႃမႃးၶၢဝ်းႁိုင်သေဢမ်ႇမီးလွင်ႈဢဝ်ၽိတ်းသင်လႆႈၸိူင်ႉႁိုဝ်၊ လႄႈၸုမ်းၶဝ်ၽွမ်ႉတႃႇႁႂ်ႈမီးလွင်ႈလႅၵ်ႈလၢႆႈဢၼ်လူဝ်ႇမူၼ်ႉမႄးလႄႈလွင်ႈလႅၵ်ႈလၢႆႈဢၼ်မၢၼ်ႇမႅၼ်ႈၼႆယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The U.S. gymnastics team has been criticized for not speaking out against Larry Nassar, the former team doctor who was convicted of sexually abusing hundreds of young athletes, including some of the team's members. The team has been criticized for not speaking out against Larry Nassar, the former team doctor who was convicted of sexually abusing hundreds of young athletes, including some of the team's members.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: ၸုမ်း USA Gymnastics လႄႈၸုမ်း USOC (United States Olympic Committee− ၵေႃႇမတီႇဢူဝ်ႊလိမ်ႊပိၵ်ႊၸိုင်ႈမိူင်း U.S.) ၶဝ်ၼၼ်ႉ မီးယိူင်းဢၢၼ်းမိူၼ်ၵၼ်ၵူၺ်း ၼၼ်ႉပဵၼ် − တႃႇႁဵတ်းႁႂ်ႈၵၢၼ်လဵၼ်ႈႁႅင်းတူဝ် ဢၼ်ပဵၼ် gymnastics လႄႈၵၢၼ်လဵၼ်ႈႁႅင်းတၢင်းၸိူဝ်းၼၼ်ႉ မီးလွင်ႈလွတ်ႈၽေးတွၼ်ႈတႃႇၵူၼ်းလဵၼ်ႈႁႅင်းၶဝ် ႁႂ်ႈပေႃးၵႂႃႇလႆႈၸွမ်းတၢင်းၶႂ်ႈပဵၼ်ၶဝ်လႆႈၶႅမ်ႉလႅပ်ႈလီငၢမ်း ၼင်ႇပွင်ပဵၼ်လႆႈယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC (United States Olympic Committee) have agreed to a new policy that will allow athletes to report abuse to law enforcement without fear of reprisal.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: ၼႂ်းပီ 1960 တၢင်းပီ၊ Brzezinski ႁဵတ်းၵၢၼ်ပဵၼ်ၵူၼ်းပၼ်တၢင်းၶႆႈၸႂ် တွၼ်ႈတႃႇၸွမ်ၸိုင်ႈ John F. Kennedy လႄႈဝၢႆးသေၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ တီႈၸုမ်းဢုပ်ႉပိူင်ႇ Lyndon B. Johnson ၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski served as a foreign policy advisor to John F. Kennedy and later to Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: ၼႂ်းၶၢဝ်းလိူၵ်ႈတင်ႈမိူဝ်ႈပီႊ 1976 မၼ်းပၼ်ၶေႃႈၼႄႉၼမ်း Carter ၼိူဝ်လွင်ႈပေႃႇလၸီႇဢၼ်ၵဵဝ်ႇတၢင်း ပၢႆးၼွၵ်ႈမိူင်း၊ ဝၢႆးလိုၼ်းမၼ်းမႃးႁဵတ်းၵၢၼ်တီႈ ၸုမ်းပၼ်တၢင်းၶႆႈၸႂ်တႃႇလွင်ႈႁူမ်ႇလူမ်ႈဝၢၼ်ႈမိူင်း (NSA) မိူဝ်ႈပီ 1977 တေႃႇထိုင်ပီႊ 1981၊ ဢၼ်ပဵၼ်ဝၢႆးလင် Henry Kissinger ၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။
mt: In 1976, Carter gave a speech on foreign policy, which later became the basis for the National Security Agency (NSA) under the direction of Henry Kissinger from 1977 to 1981.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

mt: According to NSA documents, Carter's son, Jack, was involved in the operation, which was designed to make the United States appear to be the aggressor in the 1979 Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, and the 1979 Sino-Vietnamese War, as well as the 1979 Tienanmen Square protests in China.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: ၸိူင်းဢၼ် ဢၼ်ပိူင်းၼႄလွင်ႈ Ryan Gosling လႄႈ Emma Stone လႆႈႁပ်ႉလွင်ႈယိုၼ်ႈပဵၼ် ၼႂ်းဢၼ်လမ်ႇလွင်ႈတင်းမူတ်းယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The event, which Gosling and Stone attended, was a fundraiser for the American Civil Liberties Union.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling လႄႈ Stone လႆႈႁပ်ႉၵၢၼ်တၢင်ႇယိုၼ်ႈသဵၼ်ႈၸိုဝ်ႈတႃႇႁပ်ႉသူးၸၢႆးၸိူင်းလႄႈၼၢင်းၸိူင်းၽၢႆႇလဵၼ်ႈၸိူင်းၶႅၼ်ႇသေပိူၼ်ႈသုတ်း။
mt: Gosling and Stone have been nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress, respectively, for their roles in The King's Speech.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: ၼမ်ႉၵတ်ႉတၢင်ႇဢၼ် ၸိူဝ်းဢၼ်လႆႈထုၵ်ႇလိူၵ်ႈတၢင်ႇမႃးၼၼ်ႉ တေမီး ၽၢႆႇၶႅပ်းႁၢင်ႈဢၼ်ၶႅမ်ႉသုတ်း (Best Picture)၊ ၽၢႆႇၽူႈၸတ်းၵၢၼ်ၸိူင်း (Director)၊ ၽၢႆႇၼမ်ႉၵတ်ႉပၢႆးမွၼ်းၵၢၼ်ပေႃႉၸိူင်း (Cinematography)၊ ၽၢႆႇႁၢင်ႈၶိူင်ႈ (Costume Design)၊ ၽၢႆတတ်းတေႃႇၸိူင်း (Film-editing)၊ ၽၢႆႇၽဵင်းၵႂၢမ်းဢၼ်ၸႂ်ႉၸွမ်းၸိူင်း (Original Score)၊ ၽၢႆႇၶပ်းၶိုင်ႁဵတ်းဢွၵ်ႇၽၢင်ႁၢင်ႈၶွင်ၸိူင်း (Production Design)၊ ၽၢႆႇတတ်းတေႃႇသဵင် (Sound Editing)၊ ၽၢႆႇၶပ်းၶိုင်သဵင် (Sound Mixing) လႄႈ ၽၢႆႇၶေႃႈၵႂၢမ်းဢၼ်ၸႂ်ႉၼႂ်းငဝ်းတူင်ႉမိူဝ်ႈပၢၼ်ၵွၼ်ႇ (Original Screenplay)။
mt: The awards are given in 24 categories, including Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Film Editing, Best Original Score, Best Production Design, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing, and Best Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: ၵႂၢမ်းသွင်ပုၵ်ႈၵႃႈၼႂ်းၸိူင်း Audition (The Fools Who Dream) လႄႈ City of Stars ၼၼ်ႉ လႆႈလွင်ႈယိုၼ်ႈပဵၼ် ၵႂၢမ်းငဝ်ႈတိုၼ်း ဢၼ်ၶႅမ်ႉသုတ်း။ ႁူင်းဢတ်းသဵင် Lionsgate ၵေႃႈလႆႈႁပ်ႉလွင်ႈယိုၼ်ႈပဵၼ် 26 ဢၼ် — ၼမ်လိူဝ်သေ ႁူင်းဢတ်းသဵင်တၢင်ႇဢၼ်ယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The two songs, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars," were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate also received 26 nominations — the most of any studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

mt: In a statement released by the White House, President Barack Obama said that the United States would withdraw from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: ဝၢႆးသေ Trump လႆႈဢုပ်ႇဢူဝ်းၵၼ်တင်း ၸွမ်ၸိုင်ႈမိူင်းထိူဝ်ႊၵီႇ (Turkish President) Recep Tayyip Erdoğan ၸွမ်းၾူၼ်းယဝ်ႉသေ ၸင်ႇလႆႈ ဢွၵ်ႇၶေႃႈပိုၼ်ၽၢဝ်ႇယဝ်ႉ။
mt: After Trump met with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, he issued a statement.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turkey တေႁပ်ႉဢဝ်ပႃးလွင်ႈႁႄႉၵင်ႈ သိုၵ်းၼႂ်းၸုမ်း ISIS ဢၼ်တီႉၺွပ်းဝႆႉၼၼ်ႉ ၼႆ ၼႂ်းၶေႃႈပိုၼ်ၽၢဝ်ႇလၢတ်ႈ ၼင်ႇၼႆ။ ၸိုင်ႈမိူင်းၼႂ်းယူးရူပ်ႉ ပၢၵ်ႈထဵင်ဝႆႉလွင်ႈတႃႇတေသူင်ႇမိူဝ်းၶိုၼ်းမိူင်းၵဝ်ႇၶဝ်။
mt: Turkey has announced it will repatriate its citizens from the Islamic State group's last stronghold in Syria, as the US-backed militia fighting the jihadists said it was on the verge of capturing the enclave.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: တီႈဢေႇသုတ်းမၼ်း ဢၼ်ၼႆႉမၵ်းမၼ်ႈဝႃႈ တၢႆႇၼူဝ်ႇသေႃးၶဝ်မီးၶူၼ်ၼႆၵူၺ်းဢမ်ႇၵႃး၊ တီႇဢူဝ်ႇရီႇဢၼ်ၵူၼ်းတၢင်းၼမ်ႁူႉ၊ ၵူၺ်းလၢတ်ႈၼႄ လွင်ႈတူဝ်ပဵၼ်ႁိၼ်ႁူဝ်ယွႆႈမၼ်း ဢၼ်ဢမ်ႇပဵၼ်လႆႈၸွမ်းလၢႆးၵဝ်ႇ၊ မိူၼ်ၼင်ႇ သီလႄႈ လွင်ႈၶပ်းတူၺ်း ႁႂ်ႈႁၼ်သၢမ်ၽၢၵ်ႇၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The final report concluded that the pilot was not injured, but the pilot's body was found with a broken neck, as if he had been thrown from the plane, and three fractures.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: ၸဝ်ႈပၢႆးသၢႆႊၶဝ်လၢတ်ႈဝႃႈ ၶူၼ်ပိၵ်ႇ ဢၼ်ၶႅင် တူဝ်သတ်းဢၼ်ၼႆႉ တၢင်းၼိူဝ်မၼ်းပဵၼ် သီၶွၼ်ႇႁိူဝ်ႈဝႆႉသေ တၢင်းတႂ်ႈမၼ်းသမ်ႉ ပဵၼ်သီဢၼ်ဢမ်ႇႁိူဝ်ႈဝႆႉၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The researchers say the fire was caused by a fuel leak, with the fuel tank still intact and the fuel below it not ignited.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

mt: This is a good time to remind you that the best way to improve your health is to eat right, exercise regularly and get regular checkups.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: ၵွပ်ႈပိူဝ်ႈၶူၼ်တၢႆႊၼူဝ်ႊသေႃႊ (dinosaur)ၼႆႉ ဢမ်ႇမီးၵၢၼ်ႈ(shaft) ႁွင်ႉဝႃႈ ၵႅၼ်ႈၶူၼ်(rachis)ဢၼ်ယႂ်ႇမႃးၶႅမ်ႉ၊ ၵူၺ်းၵႃႈၶဝ်မီးႁၢင်ႈၽၢင်ၶူၼ်တၢင်ႇဢၼ်ယူႇ မိူၼ်ၼင်ႇ ၵႅၼ်ႈၶူၼ်လဵၵ်ႉဢွၼ်ႇ(barbs) လႄႈ ၶူၼ်ဢၼ်သေးသေးဢွၼ်ႇ (barbules)။ ၽူႈၶူၼ်ႉၶႂႃႉၶဝ်ၸိုင်တႅပ်းတတ်းဝႃႈ ၵႅၼ်ႈၶူၼ်(rachis)မၼ်းၼၼ်ႉ တိုၵ်ႉႁႃလႅၵ်ႈလၢႆႈမႃးလွႆးလွႆးၵမ်းလိုၼ်းလင်ၽၢင်ႁၢင်ႈတၢင်ႇဢၼ်ၵူၺ်း။
mt: Because the dinosaur's tail was not a true tail, it lacked a shaft (rachis) that was elongated and stiff, but it did have a series of small, stiff, rod-like structures (barbs) and small, stiff, rod-like structures (barbules) that were arranged in a series of small, stiff, rod-like structures (barbs).
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: လၢႆးသၢင်ႈဝႆႉၶူၼ်မၼ်းပၼ်တၢင်းႁၼ်ထိုင်ဝႃႈ ဢမ်ႇလႆႈၸႂ်ႉတိုဝ်းၸိူဝ်းၼၼ်ႉ တွၼ်ႈတႃႇဝိၼ်၊  ၵူၺ်းၼႃႇလိူဝ်သေဢၼ်ၼၼ်ႉ ႁဵတ်းႁႂ်ႈဢၼ်ၵတ်းမႆႈၽဵင်ႇၵၼ်ဢမ်ႇၼၼ် တွၼ်ႈတႃႇၼႄႁၢင်ႈမၼ်းၵူၺ်း။ ၽူႈလူင်ႉလႅၼ်ႇၽၢႆႇလွင်ႈၶူၼ်ႉၶႂႃႉၶဝ် ပၼ်တၢင်းႁၼ်ထိုင်ဝႃႈ တူဝ်ႇယင်ႇမၼ်းၼႄမႃးပဵၼ် ၶူၼ်ၼူၵ်ႉဢၼ်တူဝ်ယႂ်ႇယဝ်ႉသေ ဢမ်ႇၸႂ်ႈၶူၼ်ဢူၼ်ႈဢွၼ်ႇမၼ်း လၢတ်ႈဝႃႈပဵၼ် ႁၢင်ၼူၵ်ႉ တၢႆႇၼူဝ်ႇသေႃးၼႆသေတႃႉၵေႃႈ။
mt: The autopsy report was not released to the public, but the coroner said the body was in a state of decomposition and not that of a fresh corpse.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: ၽူႈၶူၼ်ႉၶႂႃႉၶဝ် ပၼ်တၢင်းဝူၼ်ႉဝႃႈ ပိၵ်ႉသမ်ႉဝႃႈၼႆႉပဵၼ် ႁၢင်တၢႆႇၼူဝ်ႇသေႃး(dinosaur)ဢွၼ်ႇသေတႃႉၵေႃႈ ၶူဝ်းၶွင်တႅၵ်ႈၼၼ်ႉ ၼႄဝႃႈ ပဵၼ်ၶူၼ်ပိၵ်ႇၼူၵ်ႉလူင်သေ ဢမ်ႇၸ်ႂႈဢၼ်ႁူင်ႈတူၵ်းတီႈၼူၵ်ႉဢွၼ်ႇ ဢၼ်ၼိုင်ႈ ၼႆယဝ်ႉ။

src: မၼ်းပၼ်ၾၢင်ႉတႃႇ ဢၼ်ဢမ်ႇမီးၽႂ်တေၸၢင်ႊလပ်ႉလွင်းပၼ်လႆႈလွင်ႈတၢင်းသေဢၼ် ၼိူဝ်တၢင်းႁဵတ်းဢၼ် မိူင်းဢီႇရၵ်ႉ ၶဝ်တီႈၼႂ်းဢွင်ႈတီႈတႃႇတေၵိုတ်းယင်ႉ၊ ဢၼ်ႁႂ်ႈတိူဝ်းပဵၼ်လွင်ႈႁၢဝ်ႉႁႅင်းမႃး ဢမ်ၼၼ်  ႁိူဝ်ႈၵိူင်းလႆၵႂႃႇၸူးလွင်ႈသုၵ်ႉယုင်ႈၼၼ်ႉယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
mt: It is a matter of great concern that the country is facing a situation where the government is unable to control the situation, and the situation is getting worse.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: ၽိုၼ်လၢႆးငၢၼ်းၼၼ်ႉ တႄဝႆႉတင်း လွင်ႈတုၵ်းယွၼ်း တႃႇႁဵတ်းပၢင်ႁိမ်ၼမ်ႉၵႂၢမ်း လႄႈ လွင်ႈၶွတ်ႇၽွတ်ႈ တႃႇႁ်ႂႈပဵၼ်လွင်ႈၽွမ်ႉၵၼ်တင်းသဵင်ႈ ဢၼ်ၼိုင်ႈ ၼ်ႂးၸိုင်ႈမိူင်းဢမေႇရိၵၢၼ်ႇ တီႈလွင်ႈပေႃႇလသီႇ ဢၼ်ယိူင်းၸူး ၸိုင်ႈမိူင်းပွတ်းၵၢင်ဝၼ်းဢွၵ်ႇၼၼ်ႉ။
mt: The article is written with the intention of creating a platform for discussion and to promote unity among the nations of the world, especially the nations of the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

The final step in this process is to establish a permanent, ongoing, and inclusive process for the development of a new constitution, which will be based on the principles of democracy, human rights, and the rule of law, and which will ensure the protection of the rights of all Burmese citizens, including the rights of national minorities, and which will provide for the peaceful transfer of power between civilian governments. This process should be initiated as soon as possible, and should be completed within one year.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ၵေႃႉဢၼ်ပဵၼ်မေးၼၢင်း ၸွမ်ၸိုင်ႈ မိူင်း Argentina လႄႈ တႅၼ်းၽွင်းသၽႃး ယၢမ်းလဵဝ် ပိုၼ်ၽၢဝ်ႇ လွင်ႈမၼ်းတေၶဝ်ႈ ၶႄႉၶဵင်ႇပဵၼ်ၸွမ်ၸိုင်ႈ မိူဝ်ႈဝႃး ဝၢႆးဝၼ်း တီႈဝဵင်း La Plata ၊ ဢၼ်ယၢၼ်ၵႆၵၼ်တင်း ဝဵင်းလူင် Buenos Aires 50 ၵီႇလူဝ်ႇ (31 လၵ်း) ။
mt: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, the president of Argentina and current vice president, announced that she will run for president again in the next election, which will be held in the city of La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) from the capital Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: ၼၢင်းၵျီႇၶိူဝ်ႇ ပိုၼ်ၽၢဝ်ႇလွင်ႈၵၢင်ၸႂ်မၼ်းၼၢင်း တႃႇတေၶဝ်ႈၶႄႉၶဵင်ႇၸွမ်ၸိုင်ႈ တီႈၸၢတ်ႈၸိူင်းၸၢဝ်းဢႃႇၵျိၼ်ႇတီးၼႃး သေ တီႈၼၼ်ႉၵွၺ်း မၼ်းၼၢင်းယၢမ်ႈတႄႇတင်ႈ လွင်ႈဝၢင်းၽႅၼ် 2005 တႃႇ ၸုမ်းသၽႃးသႄးၼဵၵ်ႉ လူၺ်ႈပဵၼ် ၽူႈၶဝ်ႈၸုမ်း ၶွင် Buenos Aires လွင်ႈၸႅၵ်ႇဢမ်းၼၢတ်ႈၸိုင်ႈၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The 2005 Nobel Prize in Literature was awarded to Harold Pinter, a British playwright, screenwriter and director.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: လွင်ႈဢုပ်ႇၵုမ်ငူပ်ႉငီႉၵၼ်ၼၼ်ႉတႄႇပဵၼ်မႃးယွၼ်ႉလွင်ႈဢၼ်လႆႈထဵင်မေႃးၵၼ်ႁၢဝ်ႈႁႅင်းၵဵဝ်ႇလူၺ်ႈလွင်ႈၵႃႈၸႂ်ႉၸၢႆႇဢၼ်ၼမ်ႁႅင်းလူၼ်ႉလိူဝ်တႃႇၵမ်ႉၸွႆႈႁႂ်ႈသၢၵ်ႈသႃႇလူမ်ၸႂ်လႄႈတႃႇၶိုၼ်းၵေႃႇသၢင်ႈၶိုၼ်းလွင်ႈဢၼ်လႆႈလုၵွႆၵႂႃႇ ဝၢႆးသေႁူပ်ႉၽေးလူမ်းလႅင်ႉလူင် Hurricane Katrina၊ ဢၼ်ၵူၼ်းပႂ်ႉလူလွမ်ထိင်းသိမ်းၽၢႆႇၵၢၼ်ငိုၼ်းၶဝ်ၼၼ်ႉတၢင်ႇမိၵ်ႈဢၼ်လီၶႂ်ႈၶူဝ်ပၼ်ဝႃႈ "Bush's New Orleans Deal" ၼႆယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The deal was struck after a series of meetings between the two sides, which began after the devastation of Hurricane Katrina, which displaced thousands of New Orleans residents. The deal was dubbed "Bush's New Orleans Deal" by some.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: ႁႅင်းဢီးဢၼ်ၽၢႆႇလိပ်ႇပရႄႇလ် (Liberal) လႆႈထတ်းသၢင်ၼိူဝ် လွင်ႈၶိုၼ်းမႄးၵေႃႇသၢင်ႈတႄႉ ပဵၼ်လွင်ႈဢၼ်ယိုၼ်ႈလိၵ်ႈၵိၼ်ၵႅၼ်ႇတႃႇလွင်ႈၶိုၼ်းမႄးၵေႃႇသၢင်ႈ ထိုင် ၵူၼ်းလဵၼ်ႈၵၢၼ်မိူင်း ၼႂ်း ဝဵင်းဝေႃႇသျိၼ်ႇတၢၼ်ႇ (Washington) ဢၼ်ႁပ်ႉႁူႉၸွမ်း ၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The Liberal Party's election promise to build a new bridge over the Ottawa River was a promise that was too good to be true, according to people in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: ႁူဝ်ၼပ်ႉၵူၼ်းဢၼ်ပႃးဝႆႉၼၼ်ႉ မၼ်းၼမ်ၼႃသေလႄႈ မၼ်းဢမ်ႇပဵၼ်လႆႈတွၼ်ႈတႃႇ ၵူၼ်းၵူႈၵေႃႉမီးသုၼ်ႇၶဝ်ႈၵႂႃႇၼႂ်း ပၢင်မႃႇသႃႇ တီႈၼႂ်း  St. Peter's Square ၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။

src: တီႈမိူင်း Rome ရူမ်း ၼၼ်ႉ လႆႈတမ်းဝႆႉပၼ် ငဝ်းတူင်ႉ/ငဝ်းႁၢင်ႊသဵင် သႅၼ်းယႂ်ႇဝႆႉ လၢႆလၢႆဢွင်ႈတီႈ ပုၼ်ႈတႃႇၵူၼ်းတၢင်းၼမ်တူၺ်း မိူဝ်ႈပဵၼ်ပၢင်ပွႆးလူင်ၼၼ်ႉယူႇယဝ်ႉ။

ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa လႆႈပိတ်ႉၶဝ်ႈၵူဝ်းးမႃး လႆႈဝၢၵ်ႈတၢင်းသုင်သုတ်းသေ၊ ၼႂ်းၵၢၼ်လႅၼ်ႈၼၼ်ႉ လႆႈ 70 သေ သမ်ႉမၢၵ်ႇပေႃႇလုင်း 41 ​လႄႈ လူၺ်ႈ 11 ၽူဝ်း လႄႈ 2 သိၵ်ႉ ယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: ၽူႈလဵၼ်ႈ cricket ပၢၼ်ၵၢင် ၊ Sachin Tendulkar လႄႈ Rahul Dravid လဵၼ်ႈမႃးလႆႈလီငၢမ်းသေ ႁူမ်ႈလဵၼ်ႈလႄႈၶႄႉၶဵင်ႇၸွမ်းၵၼ်မႃး ၼပ်ႉႁူဝ်ပၢၵ်ႇပွၵ်ႈမၼ်းယဝ်ႉ။
mt: 2003 World Cup-winning cricketers Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid have been inducted into the ICC Hall of Fame.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: ၵူၺ်းၵႃႈ၊ ဝၢႆးသေသုမ်းႁူဝ်ၼႃႈၶွင် ၽၢႆႇပိုဝ်ႈမၢၵ်ႇ(wicket)ၶဝ်ယဝ်ႉ၊ ဢိၼ်ႊတိယႃႊ (India) ၶဝ် လႆႈမၢၵ်ႉၽၢႆႇပေႃႉသေလႅၼ်ႈ (run) တႃႇ (36) ႁွပ်ႈၵူၺ်း၊ သုမ်းပႅတ်ႈမၢၵ်ႉၽၢႆႇပိုဝ်ႈမၢၵ်ႇ (wicket) 7 မၢၵ်ႉ ဢွၼ်တၢင်းပၢင်ၶႄႉၶႅင်ႇ (innings) တေယဝ်ႉတူဝ်ႈ။
mt: However, after the dismissal of the wicketkeeper, India scored 36 runs and lost seven wickets in the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: George W. Bush ၊ ၸွမ်ၸိုင်ႈမိူင်း US ၊ ႁွတ်ႈထိုင် မိူင်း Singapore  မိူဝ်ႈဝၼ်းထီႉ 16 လိူၼ် November (လိူၼ်ထူၼ်ႈ 11) ၽွင်းၶၢဝ်းယၢမ်းၵၢင်ၼႂ်သေ တႄႇဢွၵ်ႇၶၢဝ်းတၢင်းဢႅဝ်ႇလႄႇ ၼႂ်းၵုၼ်ဢေးသျူး တႃႇၼိုင်ႈဝူင်ႈၼႆယဝ်ႉ။
mt: Former US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on Monday (Nov 16) for a one-day visit.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: မၼ်းၸၢႆးလႆႈႁပ်ႉၵၢၼ်တွၼ်ႈႁပ်ႉ လူၺ်ႈၵႅမ်ၸွမ်ၽွင်းၶွင်မိူင်းသိင်ႇၵပူဝ်ႇ ဢၼ်မီးၸိုဝ်ႈဝႃႈ Wong Kan Seng လႄႈ လႆႈလၢတ်ႈတေႃႇဢုပ်ႇဢူဝ်းလွင်ႈၵႃႉၶၢႆလႄႈ လွင်ႈၵၢၼ်ၵေႃႇၵၢၼ်ႁၢႆႉ တင်းၸွမ်ၽွင်းလူင်ၶွင်မိူင်းသိင်ႇၵပူဝ်ႇ ဢၼ်မီးၸိုဝ်ႈဝႃႈ Lee Hsien Loong ၼၼ်ႉယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
mt: His son was admitted to hospital for observation and treatment, and was visited by Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong and Minister for Foreign Affairs and Law Wong Kan Seng.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: ဝၢႆးသုမ်းၵၢၼ်ႉပၢင်လိူၵ်ႈတင်ႈၶိုင်ႈတၢင်းဝူင်ႈၵၢင် မႃးဝူင်ႈၼိူင်ႈၼၼ်ႉ  Bush လၢတ်ႈတီႈၵူၼ်းၵမ်ႉထႅမ် ပၼ်ႁႅင်းမၼ်းၵေႃႉၼိူင်ႈ လွင်ႈၶႂၢၵ်ႈၵၢၼ်ၵႃႉၶၢႆတီႈလုမ်လိၼ်ဢေးသျႃး ယဝ်ႉ။
mt: Bush told the crowd that the U.S. was committed to helping the country rebuild its agriculture sector.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: ဝၢႆးသေပၢင်ၵုမ် ‘Tuesday's 25 minute’ ဢၼ်လႆႈႁူပ်ႉထူပ်းၸွမ်း Jack Layton ၵေႃႉပဵၼ်ႁူဝ်ၼႃႈပႃႇတီႇ NDP တီႈလုမ်းၶွင်ၸွမ်ၽွင်းလူင်(PMO) ယဝ်ႉၼၼ်ႉ ၸွမ်ၽွင်းလူင် Stephen Harper လႆႈၸႂ်ၸွမ်းယဝ်ႉဝႃႈတေသူင်ႇမၢႆမီႈၶွင်လူင်ပွင်ၸိုင်ႈဢၼ်ပဵၼ် 'Clean Air Act' ထိုင်ၸုမ်းပွင်ၵၢၼ်ၵူႈပႃႇတီႇတႃႇတေထတ်းသၢင်တူၺ်းၶိုၼ်း ဢွၼ်တၢင်းတေဢုပ်ႇၵုမ်ၵၼ်ထႅင်ႈပွၵ်ႈၵမ်းသွင်။
mt: After Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with Jack Layton, leader of the NDP, Prime Minister Stephen Harper said he would meet with the leaders of the other parties to discuss the Clean Air Act.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton လႆႈယွၼ်းလွင်ႈလႅၵ်ႈလၢႆႈ တႃႇဝႂ်တိုတ်းသိင်ႇဝႅတ်ႉလွမ်ႉၶွင်ပႃႇတီႇၶွၼ်ႇသိူဝ်ႇဝေးတိပ်ႉ ၼႂ်းပၢင်ၵုမ်တင်း ၸွမ်ၽွင်းသေ လႆႈယွၼ်း ဝႂ်တိုတ်းသိင်ႇဝႅတ်ႉလွမ်ႉ ၶွင်ပႃႇတီႇၶွၼ်ႇသိူဝ်ႇဝေးတိပ်ႉ ၶဝ် ဝႃႈ "ၽိုၼ်ဢၼ်ၶိုၼ်းတႅမ်ႈဢၼ်ၶႅမ်ႉလႅပ်ႈလႄႈတဵမ်ထူၼ်ႈ" ၼႆယဝ်ႉ။
mt: Layton has asked for a review of the report by the House Intelligence Committee, saying it is "incomplete and flawed."
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: ၸဵမ်မိူဝ်ႈလူင်ပွင်ၸိုင်ႈ ၽႄႇတရႄႇ ယၢင်ႈတိၼ်ၶဝ်ႈၼႂ်း လွင်ႈၵုမ်းထိင်းငိုၼ်းတွင်းၶွင် ႁူင်းယႃမႃႊသေး ၼႂ်းၸိုင်ႈ တီဝူဝ်ႇပွတ်ႉ ၵုၼ်တႃႇမၼီႇယႃႊ တႅၼ်းၽွင်းၽွမ်ႉႁူမ်ႈၵမ်ႈၽွင်ႈ သေႉၼေးၼိူဝ်လွင်ႈႁဵတ်းသၢင်ႈမိူၼ်ၼင်ႇဝႃႈပဵၼ် လွင်ႈၶႂ်ႈလႆႈၼႃႈဢၼ်ႁဵတ်းဝႆႉဢွၼ်တၢင်း ၸူဝ်ႈပႆႇထိုင် ပၢင်လိူၵ်ႈတင်ႈ ၽႄႇတရႄႇဢၼ်တေၸတ်းႁဵတ်းၼႂ်းလိူၼ် ထူၼ်ႈသိပ်းဢဵတ်း ၼၼ်ႉယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The government has been criticized for its handling of the outbreak, which has been described as a "slow-motion disaster" by the World Health Organization.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: ၵူၺ်းၵႃႈ ၽွင်းလူင်ၵျွၼ်ႊ ႁၢဝ်ႊဝိူတ်ႉ (John Howard လၢတ်ႈဝႃႈ လွင်ႈဢၼ်ၶဝ်ၵမ်ႉၸွႆႈ တႃႇငိုၼ်း45 လၢၼ်ႉ တေႃႇလႃႇမိူင်း Australia ၼၼ်ႉ ပဵၼ်လွင်ႈႁဵတ်းသၢင်ႈတႃႇ ႁႄႉၵင်ႈႁူင်းယႃဢၼ်ႁၢင်ႈႁၢႆႉလူင်းယွၼ်ႉၵွပ်ႈၵၢၼ်ၸတ်းၵၢၼ်ၶွင်လူင်ပွင်ၸိုင်ႈၸႄႈမိူင်း Tasmania (Tasmanian government) ၶဝ်ၼၼ်ႉ ႁႂ်ႈမီးၶိူင်ႈၸႂ်ႉတိုဝ်းသိုပ်ႇၵႂႃႇလႆႈလႄႈဢမ်ႇႁၢင်ႈႁၢႆႉလူင်းလိူဝ်ၵဝ်ႇၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။
mt: However, Prime Minister John Howard said the decision to build the hospital was made by the Tasmanian government, not the federal government.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: ဢိင်ၼိူဝ်ၶေႃႈၵပ်းသိုပ်ႇ ၵမ်းလိုၼ်းသုတ်းသေ တၢင်းတႅၵ်ႈ သူႇၼႃႇမီႇ လူၺ်ႈလွင်ႈၵၢၼ်လူဢၢၼ်ႇတၢင်းသုင်ၼႃႈၼမ်ႉပၢင်ႇလၢႆႇၼၼ်ႉ လႆႈထုၵ်ႇသၢင်ႈၶိုၼ်ႈမႃးဝႆႉယဝ်ႉ။ မီးလွင်ႈၵဵပ်းမၢႆဢၼ်ထုၵ်ႇမႅၼ်ႈတႅတ်ႈၼႅတ်ႈလီၵမ်ႈၽွင်ႈ တီႈႁိမ်းႁွမ်း Pago Pago လႄႈ Niue ၼၼ်ႉဝႆႉယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The airline has been operating a limited schedule between Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: ဢမ်ႇမီးလွင်ႈလူႉလႅဝ်ဢမ်ႇၼၼ်လွင်ႈၸဵပ်းမၢတ်ႇလူင်လၢင်တီႈၼႂ်း တွၼ်ႇၵႃႉ ပွင်ႇၶၢဝ်ႇမႃး သေတႃႉ ၾႆးၾႃႉတႄႉလႆႈၶၢတ်ႇႁၢႆပႅတ်ႈၸူဝ်ႈၶၢဝ်း ဢၼ်ႁႄႉႁၢမ်ႈၽူႈမီးပုၼ်ႈၽွၼ်း တွၼ်ႇၵႃႉ ၶဝ် ၼင်ႇႁိုဝ်တေလႆႈႁပ်ႉၶေႃႈၽၢင်ႉသိုဝ်ႇၼႃႇမီႇ ဢၼ်ပိုၼ်ၽၢဝ်ႇလူၺ်ႈ PTWC ။
mt: There are no tsunami warnings, watches or advisories in effect. However, the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center has issued a tsunami information statement.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: ႁူင်းႁဵၼ်းသိပ်းသီႇလင် ၸိူဝ်းမီးဝႆႉတီႈၼိူဝ်ၽင်ႇၼမ်ႉ ဢမ်ႇၼၼ် ၸိူဝ်းၸမ်ၽင်ႇၼမ်ႉ တီႈၼ်ႂးႁႃႇဝၢႆႇဢီႇ(Hawaii)ၼၼ်ႉ ႁူမ်ႈဝႃႈလွင်ႈၾၢင်ႉပၼ်သတီႉၸိူဝ်းၼၼ်ႉ ယိုတ်းယဝ်ႉၵေႃႈ တေဢိုတ်းဝႆႉ ဝၼ်းပုတ်ႉၵူႈဝၼ်းယဝ်ႉ။
mt: Schools in the state of Hawaii, including those on the islands of Oahu, Maui, Kauai and Hawaii, will be closed for the rest of the week.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: ၸွမ်ၸိုင်ႈမိူင်း US George W. Bush ႁူမ်ၸူမ်းႁပ်ႉတွၼ်ႈ ၶေႃႈပိုၼ်ၽၢဝ်ႇ။
mt: US President George W. Bush accepted the resignation.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Gordon Johndroe ၽူႈမီးသုၼ်ႇလၢတ်ႈၵႂၢမ်းၶွင် ၸွမ်ပွင်ၸိုင်ႈပုတ်ႉ ပိုၼ်ၶၢဝ်ႇတီႈ လွင်ႈပၼ်ၵတိၶွင်မိူင်းၵူဝ်းရီးယႃးပွတ်းႁွင်ႇဝႃႈ " ပိူင်လူင်လွင်ႈယၢင်ႈပႆၼႆႉ ၵဵဝ်ႇလူၺ်ႈ ယိူင်းမၢႆတႃႇလႆႈလွင်ႈၸႅတ်ႈထတ်း ၵၢၼ်ဢဝ်ၼျူးၵရီယႃးပႅတ်ႈ တီႈၵုၼ်ယွၼ်ႇမိူင်းၵူဝ်းရီးယႃး " ၼၼ်ႉၼေယဝ်ႉ။
mt: "This is a significant step in the global effort to eradicate polio," Johndroe said.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: လူမ်းလႅင်ႉပွၵ်ႈထီႉသိပ်းဢၼ်ပဵၼ် တီႈၼႂ်း ၶၢဝ်းႁႃႇရီႇၵဵင်းလူမ်းလႅင်ႉလူင် ဢၼ်ပဵၼ်ၼႂ်းပၢင်ႇလၢႆႇ Atlantic၊ လူမ်းလႅင်ႉလူင် Jerry၊ ဢၼ်ပဵၼ်ပွတ်းၸမ်ၶၢဝ်းမႆႈ၊ ပဵၼ်မႃးမိူဝ်ႈၼႆႉ ၼႂ်းပၢင်ႇလၢႆႇ Atlantic မိူဝ်ႈၼႆႉယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The Jerry, a large Atlantic-class icebreaker, was built in 1975 and is the largest ship in the Canadian Coast Guard fleet.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: National Hurricane Center (NHC)  လၢတ်ႈဝႃႈ Jerry ဢမ်ႇမီးၽေးတႃႇလိၼ်မိူင်း တီႈၸၼ်ႉမိူဝ်ႈလဵဝ်ၼႆႉၼႆယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says Jerry is not a threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: U.S. Corps of Engineers လၢမ်းဝႃႈ ၼမ်ႉၾူၼ်ဢၼ်တူၵ်း 6 ၼိဝ်ႉၸၢင်ႈယႃႉၵွႆ ၽၢႆဢၼ်ၵွႆဝႆႉမိူဝ်ႈဢွၼ်တၢင်းၼႆယဝ်ႉ။
mt: 6 feet of water has flooded the area where the water was being pumped, according to the U.S. Corps of Engineers.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: ပွၵ်ႉမၢႆၵဝ်ႈ၊ ဢၼ်လႆႈႁၼ်ၼမ်ႉထူမ်ႈၽႅဝ်ထိုင် 20 ပေႇမိူဝ်ႈ လူမ်းလႅင်ႉလူင်  Hurricane Katrina မႃး၊ ၼၼ်ႉမိူဝ်ႈလဵဝ် ၼမ်ႉပဵင်းဢႅဝ်ၵွပ်ႈ ဢၼ်ႁႄႉၼမ်ႉမီးႁိမ်းၼၼ်ႉ သုင်လိူဝ်ႁႅင်း။
mt: 20 feet of water flooded the area during Hurricane Katrina, and the water is now receding.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: ပွတ်းတွၼ်ႈ ဢၼ်ၼမ်ႉလူၼ်ႉပူၼ်ႉၽႃႁႄႉၼမ်ႉၼၼ်ႉလမီးတၢင်းၵႂၢင်ႈ 100 ထတ်း။
mt: 100 meters wide.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: မိူဝ်ႈမၼ်းလၢတ်ႈဢုပ်ႇတင်းၶၢဝ်ႇဝီႇၵီႇ မိူဝ်ႈလိူၼ်ပူၼ်ႉၼၼ်ႉ ၽူႈၶပ်းၶိုင်ၵၢၼ်လွင်ႈၶူဝ်းၶွင်တူင်ႇဝူင်း Adam Cuerden ၼႄလွင်ႈတၢင်းဢမ်ႇပေႃးၸႂ်တေႃႇ လွင်ႈမွတ်ႇပႅတ်ႈၸိူဝ်းၼၼ်ႉယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
mt: တီႈၼႂ်းၶၢဝ်ႇဝီႇၵီႇမိူဝ်ႈလိူၼ်ပူၼ်ႉၼၼ်ႉ ၽူႈၶပ်းၶိုင်ၵၢၼ်လွင်ႈၶူဝ်းၶွင်တူင်ႇဝူင်း Adam Cuerden ၼႄလွင်ႈတၢင်းဢမ်ႇပေႃးၸႂ်တေႃႇ လွင်ႈမွတ်ႇပႅတ်ႈၸိူဝ်းၼၼ်ႉယူႇယဝ်ႉ။
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: ပေႃးတေလၢတ်ႈငဝ်ႈမၼ်းၵေႃႈ မၼ်းၸၢႆး [ဝုၺ်း] လႆႈလၢတ်ႈလႅၼ်တီႈႁဝ်း ၸဵမ်မိူဝ်ႈတႄႇမၼ်းယဝ်ႉ။ ၶေႃႈဢွၼ်တၢင်းသုတ်း ႁဵတ်းမိူၼ်ၼင်ႇလွင်ႈၼႆႉပဵၼ်ၸွမ်းပၵ်းၸွမ်းပိူင်။ ၶေႃႈထီႉသွင် ႁဵတ်းၵႅင်ႈမိူၼ်မၼ်းထွမ်ႇၸိူဝ်းႁဝ်းယူႇသေယဝ်ႉ ႁဵတ်းလွင်ႈမွတ်ႇပႅတ်ႈပၢႆးမွၼ်းၶွင်မၼ်းၼၼ်ႉၵမ်းလဵဝ်ယဝ်ႉ။
mt: [Wang]  said his son had been saying this to us since he was young. The final instruction is to follow and obey. The third instruction is to be careful and be careful of the instructions we have given you. The instruction to stop the operation of his organs is now.
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: လွင်ႈယူႇယၢပ်ႇ ၼႂ်းတူင်ႇဝူင်းၵူၼ်း ဢွၼ်ႁူဝ်ထိုင်လွင်ႈႁဵတ်းသၢင်ႈဢၼ်ပဵၼ်ယူႇမိူဝ်ႈလဵဝ် တႃႇၽႅၼ်ၵၢၼ်ဢၼ်ပဵၼ်ႁူၼ်ႈၼႃႈတႃႇ ပေႃႇလၸီႇတွၼ်ႈတႃႇလွင်ႈတၢင်းၵႃႇမဢၼ်ပႃးၼႂ်းဝဵပ်ႉသၢႆႉ ဢၼ်ပိုၼ်ၽေၸွမ်းသၢႆၼႅင်ႊဢွၼ်လၢႆးမီးဝႂ်ၸႅင်ႈလႅင်း ႁူဝ်လၢၼ်ႉမၼ်းၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။
mt: လွင်ႈယူႇယၢပ်ႇ ၼႂ်းတူင်ႇဝူင်းၵူၼ်း ဢွၼ်ႁူဝ်ထိုင်လွင်ႈႁဵတ်းသၢင်ႈဢၼ်ပဵၼ်ယူႇမိူဝ်ႈလဵဝ် တႃႇၽႅၼ်ၵၢၼ်ဢၼ်ပဵၼ်ႁူၼ်ႈၼႃႈတႃႇ ပေႃႇလၸီႇတွၼ်ႈတႃႇလွင်ႈတၢင်းၵႃႇမဢၼ်ပႃးၼႂ်းဝဵပ်ႉသၢႆႉ ဢၼ်ပိုၼ်ၽေၸွမ်းသၢႆၼႅင်ႊဢွၼ်လၢႆးမီးဝႂ်ၸႅင်ႈလႅင်း ႁူဝ်လၢၼ်ႉမ�
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: ၵၢၼ်ဢၼ်ႁဵတ်းယဝ်ႉၵမ်ႈပႃႈၼမ်ၼၼ်ႉပဵၼ်ပၢႆးဝူၼ်ႉတႃႇလဵပ်ႈႁဵၼ်း၊ ၵူၺ်းၵႃႈ ပရူဝ်ႊၵႅမ်ႊ (program) ဢၼ်လႆႈတႅမ်ႈဢွၵ်ႇမႃးၼၼ်ႉ ပဵၼ်တွၼ်ႈတႃႇတေၸၢမ်းတူၺ်း ၵၢၼ်လူလွမ်ပႂ်ႉတူၺ်း ဢၼ်လုၵ်ႉတီႈ လႅင်လၢဝ် Sagittarius ၼၼ်ႉမႃး။
mt: The program was designed to help people learn about the history of the liberation of the Sagittarius constellation.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: မၼ်းၵေႃႈ မိူၼ်ၼင်ႇ လိူၼ်မီးႁႅင်းၸၼ်ၼိူဝ်လုမ်ၾႃႉသေ ႁဵတ်းႁႂ်ႈမီးလွင်ႈၼမ်ႉၶိုၼ်ႈၼမ်ႉလူင်း ၼၼ်ႉၵွၺ်း ၵလႅၵ်ႊသီႇ Milky Way (သဵၼ်ႈတၢင်းမဵဝ်ႉၵျီႇ) ၵေႃႈတေႃႈၼင်ႇၼၼ် မၼ်းမီးႁႅင်းသူင်ႇထိုင်ၼိူဝ် ၵလႅၵ်ႊသီႇ Sagittarius ၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။
mt: It is also like the Milky Way (our galaxy) is on a collision course with the galaxy known as the Sagittarius.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: ၽူႈလူင်ႉလႅၼ်ႇပၢႆးသၢႆႊၶဝ် လႆႈၶွတ်ႇယွတ်ႈၵႂၢမ်းဝႃႈ သိင်ႇၶွင်သီလမ်ၼၼ်ႉ မီးၽွၼ်းၼိူဝ် သီၶွင်သီလမ်တၢင်ႇဢၼ် မိူၼ်ၼင်ႇသိင်ႇၶွင်ပၵတိၼၼ်ႉၵူၺ်း။
mt: The researchers said the device was similar to a "lab-on-a-chip" that could be used to detect cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: တီႇဢူဝ်ႇရီႇဢၼ်ၼႆႉလၢတ်ႈဝႃႈ သိင်ႇၶွင်ဢၼ်လပ်းသိုင်ႇသေပိူၼ်ႈႁိမ်းႁွမ်း ၵလႅၵ်ႇသီႇဢၼ်ၼိုင်ႈၼႆႉ မီးႁိမ်းႁွမ်း ၵလႅၵ်ႇသီႇ ဢၼ်မဵဝ်းမီးတူင်ႇဝူင်းလႅင်းဢၼ်မူၼ်းၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ၊ လႄႈ ႁဵတ်းဝႆႉတၢင်းၽွင်လဵၵ်ႉဢွၼ်ႇတၢင်းၼမ်။
mt: တီႇဢူဝ်ႇရီႇလၢတ်ႈဝႃႈ သိင်ႇၶွင်ဢၼ်လပ်းသိုင်ႇသေပိူၼ်ႈႁိမ်းႁွမ်း ၵလႅၵ်ႇသီႇဢၼ်ၼိုင်ႈၼႆႉ မီးႁိမ်းႁွမ်း ၵလႅၵ်ႇသီႇ ဢၼ်မဵဝ်းမီးတူင်ႇဝူင်းလႅင်းဢၼ်မူၼ်းၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ၊ လႄႈ ႁဵတ်းဝႆႉတၢင်းၽွင်လဵၵ်ႉဢွၼ်ႇတၢင်းၼမ်။
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

mt: Local residents are advised to stay indoors, keep windows and doors closed and refrain from cooking or smoking.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: ဢိင်ၼိူဝ်ၸုမ်းႁဵတ်းသၢင်ႈၼိဝ်ၵလီးယႃး ၶွင်မိူင်းၵျပၢၼ်ႇၶဝ်သေ ထၢတ်ႈ caesium လႄႈ ထၢတ်ႈ iodine ဢၼ်ပဵၼ် radioactive ယူႇၼၼ်ႉ လႆႈထုၵ်ႇထတ်းသၢင်ႈႁၼ်တီႈ ႁူင်းၼိဝ်ၵလီးယႃးၼၼ်ႉယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The team from the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences, which is responsible for the Nobel Prizes, has been able to see the caesium and iodine, which are radioactive, in the laboratory.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: ၽူႈမီးပုၼ်ႈၽွၼ်းၶဝ် လၢမ်းဝႃႈ လွင်ႈၼႆႉၼႄဝႃႈ တိူၵ်ႈဢၼ်သႂ်ႇဝႆႉ ၼမ်ႉမၼ်း Uranium ၼႂ်းဢွင်ႈတီႈၼၼ်ႉ လႅပ်ႈတႅၵ်ႇပွင်ႇသေ ႁူဝ်ႈၸိုမ်းဢွၵ်ႇမႃး ၼႆယဝ်ႉ။
mt: The source of the leak was a tank containing uranium, which was found to be leaking, the company said.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll လႆႈသွၵ်ႈႁၼ်ၺႃး ၸိူဝ်ႉမႅင်းတၢင်းပဵၼ်ဢႆဢွၵ်ႇလိူတ်ႈ(ထီႇပီႇ)ဢၼ်လိုၼ်ႈယႃႁၢဝ်ႈႁႅင်း (Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis − XDR-TB) တီႈၼႂ်းဝဵင်း ‘KwaZulu-Natal’ ပွတ်းတွၼ်ႈၼိုင်ႈၼႂ်းမိူင်းဢႅပ်ႊၾရိၵၸၢၼ်း (South Africa) ။
mt: Dr. Tony Moll  discovered the first case of XDR-TB in the city of ‘KwaZulu-Natal’ in South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

mt: In the question-and-answer session, the son said, "Because there is a chance to die, there is a chance to be happy, and there is a chance to be loved."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: ၵူၼ်းပဵၼ်မၢင်ၵေႃႉ ထုၵ်ႇလီတၢင်ႇၽိုၼ် ၼႂ်းႁူင်းယႃ ၊ Dr. Moll ဝူၼ်ႉသွၼ်ႇဝႃႈ တီႈဢေႇသုတ်းတႄႉ ၵူၼ်းသွင်ၵေႃႉ ပဵၼ်ဝႆႉၽူႈၸွၺ်ႈပၢႆးယူႇလီၼႂ်းႁူင်းယႃယူႇၼႆယဝ်ႉ။
mt: Dr. Moll said that at the end of the day, two people were found to be infected with the virus.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
